### getAnalysisUsage() {#a09e5cc047d879ebea6c53e307060e4b4}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/xrayinstrumentation-cpp/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/xrayinstrumentation-cpp">XRayInstrumentation.cpp</a>.
